trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle mouse related routed events that do not specifically involve mouse buttons or the mouse wheel; for example, <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 처리할 메서드를 마우스 관련 라우트된 이벤트를 마우스 단추나 마우스 휠과 특별히 관련 되지 않은 나타냅니다. 예를 들어 <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This delegate is used with the following attached events: - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.GotMouseCapture?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.LostMouseCapture?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> This delegate is used with the following routed events.
trans-unit.target: 이 대리자는 다음 연결 된 이벤트와 함께 사용:- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.GotMouseCapture?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.LostMouseCapture?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseMove?displayProperty=fullName>이 대리자는 다음 라우트된 이벤트와 함께 사용 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.LostMouseCapture?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.GotMouseCapture?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: These routed events forward the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 일반 요소 모델에 쉽게 액세스할 수 있도록 앞에 나열 된 연결 된 이벤트를 전달 하는 이러한 라우트된 이벤트의 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]합니다.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseMove?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseMove?displayProperty=fullName>연결 된 이벤트와 기본 요소의 라우트된 이벤트의 이벤트 데이터를 공유 하 고 버블링 터널링 라우트된 이벤트의 버전 및 이벤트 데이터를 공유할 수도 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route.
trans-unit.target: 이 경로 따라 이동할 때 이벤트의 처리 된 특성에 영향을 줄 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Other than the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs> properties that are relevant for all routed events, the most interesting properties of <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs> that you might use in a MouseEventHandler implementation are several properties that expose the current button state, such as <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs.LeftButton%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs.MouseDevice%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 이외의 <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs>모든 라우트된 이벤트의 <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs>MouseEventHandler 구현에서 사용할 수는 일부의 속성이 등 <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs.LeftButton%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs.MouseDevice%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs.MouseDevice%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs.LeftButton%2A> 현재 단추 상태를 노출 하는</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs> 가장 중요 한 속성에 대 한 관련이 있는 속성</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs> 값

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs.MouseDevice%2A> is useful particularly because you can check <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice.Captured%2A> on it.
Note that events that specifically deal with mouse button events use a different delegate, <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventHandler>.
trans-unit.target: 구체적으로는 마우스 단추 이벤트를 처리 하는 이벤트는 다른 대리자 <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventHandler>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventHandler> 사용

trans-unit.source: The mouse button properties are available on <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs> in case there are input modes or interactions that involve the buttons even if you are handling a non-button event.
trans-unit.target: 마우스 단추 속성에서 사용할 수 있는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs>입력된 모드 또는 단추 이외의 이벤트를 처리 하는 경우에 있는 단추를 포함 하는 상호 작용 하는 경우.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs>
